buildCommand: node vercel-setup.js && cd apps/web && SKIP_WORKERD=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false yarn build:production && cp -r build/* ../build/
installCommand: npx corepack@latest enable && npx corepack prepare yarn@3.2.3 --activate && yarn install
